Package icyllis.modernui.graphics

Class GLSurfaceCanvas.UniformBuffer

java.lang.Object
icyllis.modernui.graphics.GLSurfaceCanvas.UniformBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
Enclosing class:
GLSurfaceCanvas
public static class GLSurfaceCanvas.UniformBuffer extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Represents a OpenGL buffer object.

  • Constructor Details

    • UniformBuffer

      public UniformBuffer()

  • Method Details

    • getBufferID

      public final int getBufferID()
      Returns the OpenGL buffer object name currently associated with this object, or create and initialize it if not available. It may change in the future if it is explicitly deleted.
      Returns:
      OpenGL buffer object

    • bindBase

      public void bindBase(int target, int index)
      Binds this buffer to the indexed buffer target, as well as entirely to the binding point in the array given by index. Each target has its own indexed array of buffer object binding points.
      Parameters:
      target - the target of the bind operation
      index - the index of the binding point within the array specified by target

    • bindRange

      public void bindRange(int target, int index, long offset, long size)
      Binds this buffer to the indexed buffer target, as well as a range within it to the binding point in the array given by index. Each target has its own indexed array of buffer object binding points.
      Parameters:
      target - the target of the bind operation
      index - the index of the binding point within the array specified by target
      offset - the start offset in bytes into the buffer
      size - the amount of data in bytes that can be read from the buffer object while used as an indexed target

    • allocate

      public void allocate(long size)
      Creates the immutable data store of this buffer object.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the data store in bytes

    • upload

      public void upload(long offset, long size, long data)
      Modifies a subset of this buffer object's data store.
      Parameters:
      offset - the offset into the buffer object's data store where data replacement will begin, measured in bytes
      size - the size in bytes of the data store region being replaced
      data - a pointer to the new data that will be copied into the data store, can't be NULL

    • close

      public void close()
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
